properties.name: Brot für die Welt
properties.description: Posted by Bijank Fundtrac® was set up at more than five partner organizations in East Africa. The employees were trained by CIWI in Cameroon.

properties.name: CEFORMAD (Financial Project Management)
properties.description: Posted by Bijank CIWI set up financial project management systems to allow local development aid NGOs to serve their constituencies better and manage their projects more efficiently.

properties.name: CRAFOD
properties.description: Posted by Bijank CIWI set up a remote satellite uplink and installed financial project management systems to allow local development aid NGOs to serve their constituencies better and manage their projects more efficiently.

properties.name: CTC (GTZ-funded PPP project)
properties.description: Posted by Bijank CIWI realises a GTZ-funded public-private-partnership with partners in Tbilisi, Georgia.

properties.name: Danube Promotion Agency
properties.description: Posted by Bijank Application consultancy for EU grant-in-aid funds within the framework of the Interreg CADSES and URBACTII programmes.

properties.name: Desmond Tutu Centre for Leadership (C4L)
properties.description: Posted by Bijank Setting up of Fundtrac® for our partner “Centre for Lifelong Learning” in South Africa.

properties.name: EED (Church Development Service)
properties.description: Posted by Bijank Fundtrac® was set up for the EED Church Development Service in more than 10 partner organizations in Central Africa.

properties.name: Help e.V.
properties.description: Posted by Bijank Implementation of Fundtrac 2.8 and Fundtrac Light at the headquarters in Bonn and in other coordination offices in the Balkan and other countries worldwide. First installation of Fundtrac with a genuine DATEV-interface for seamless export of all data.

properties.name: IDEM
properties.description: Posted by Bijank Setting up of Fundtrac® for IDEM - identity through initiative.

properties.name: Malter International - Thailand Office
properties.description: Posted by Bijank CIWI GmbH has advised Malteser international on the implementation of a new global finance and project accounting system. Thus, Fundtrac® has replaced SAP as the standard software at Malteser. At present Fundtrac® is in regular use in approximately 40 locations worldwide by over 180 users.

properties.name: Medica Mondiale
properties.description: Posted by Bijank Medica Mondiale brings sustainable development to Africa and other countries and works for women\'s empowerment through a system of local and independent NGOs. It also runs its headquarter\'s financial management system on Fundtrac 2.8.

properties.name: SADRI - Community Development in Eastern Congo
properties.description: Posted by Bijank CIWI set up a remote satellite uplink in Lubumbashi to allow local development aid NGOs to serve their constituencies better and manage their projects more efficiently.

properties.name: SANGONET 2007 Conference
properties.description: Posted by Bijank CIWI presented its products for the non-profit area at 2007\'s SANGONET Conference in Johannesburg, the place to go for civil society technology solutions in Africa.

properties.name: SEKEM (Rural Development)
properties.description: Posted by Bijank CIWI manages a rural development project together with SEKEM and the SEKEM Support Foundation Germany.

properties.name: Shota Rustaveli State University
properties.description: Posted by Bijank CIWI realises a GTZ-funded public-private-partnership with partners in Batumi, Georgia.

properties.name: Sinai Peninsula Development Project
properties.description: Posted by Bijank CIWI works with the UK\'s Makhad Trust to bring social and environmental development to Egypt\'s Sinai peninsula. Main beneficiaries are the Bedouin peasants around St. Catherine city.

properties.name: Terre des Hommes
properties.description: Posted by Bijank Terre des Hommes brings sustainable development to Africa and runs its headquarter\'s financial management system on Fundtrac 2.8.

properties.name: Terre des Hommes - Central African Office
properties.description: Posted by Bijank CIWI implemented a financial project management system for development aid in Africa.

properties.name: Terre des Hommes - India Office
properties.description: Posted by Bijank Fundtrac creates transparency in the planning and development processes of the offices that work with 20 co-workers worldwide. These alow for the direct contact with partner organisations and support the projects of terre des hommes locally. CIWI also trains all employees involved.

properties.name: Terre des Hommes - Nicaragua Office
properties.description: Posted by Bijank Fundtrac creates transparency in the planning and development processes of the offices of terre des hommes that work with 20 coworkers worldwide. These allow for the direct contact with partner organisations and support the projects of terre des hommes locally. CIWI also trains all employees involved.

properties.name: Terre des Hommes - South African Office
properties.description: Posted by Bijank Fundtrac creates transparency in the planning and development processes of the offices of terre des hommes that work with 20 coworkers worldwide. These allow for the direct contact with partner organisations and support the projects of terre des hommes locally. CIWI also trains all employees involved.

properties.name: The Makhad Trust
properties.description: Posted by Bijank CIWI works with the UK\'s Makhad Trust to bring social and environmental development to Egypt\'s Sinai peninsula.

properties.name: The Water Foundation
properties.description: Posted by Bijank The CIWI GmbH supported the WasserStiftung (WaterFoundation), Germany, in the development of a project application for the BMZ. The objective of the project is to improve access to the drinking water reserves for poor communities in the hilly region of Eritrea in the Asmara region. The war and drought-stricken country is faced with severe infrastructural problems. The objective of the Water Foundation is to improve the situation with the help of an innovative action. Fog nets were installed to “harvest the clouds”. Such simple-to-handle technologies are a milestone in the improvement of the quality of life for many villages in the Asmara Region.

properties.name: tdh ORA Office
properties.description: Posted by Merckens
